snippet: Coming soon from Davis Guggenheim, an Academy Award-winning director: an action-packed film for the Obama campaign titled "The Road We've Traveled." The trailer was released Thursday.
abstract: Coming soon from Davis Guggenheim, an Academy Award-winning director: an action-packed film for the Obama campaign titled "The Road We've Traveled." The trailer was released Thursday.

headline.main: Obama Campaign Video Highlights First Term
headline.print_headline: A Bit of Gloss on Obama’s Presidency
